titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3259) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1997 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-830, by Mr. Goss.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 282.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3259. Waiving poits of order against the conference report and against its consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/24/1996--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 3259 (authorizing appropriations for intelligence and intelligence-related activities).
